description: White sauce (one of the mother sauces) commonly used for lasagne and lots of other things.

directions.step: In a saucepan, melt the butter at low heat.
Add the flour and stir constantly until butter and flour combine and nothing is sticking to the walls.
Add some of the cold milk. Stirring constantly until the mixture is smooth.
Add some more milk and repeat until all the milk has been added.
Bring to a boil and cook for 10 minutes, still stirring constantly. (it should become smooth and velvety.)
Add salt, pepper and nutmeg to taste.
Turn off heat, stirring occasionally until cold, to prevent the formation of a crust.
